## ema() function

[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Moving\_average\#Exponential\_moving\_average](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Moving_average#Exponential_moving_average)

Note: the number of results will be `period-1` less than the number of processed inputs.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function ema(period: number): Transducer<number, number>;
```

|  period | <code>number</code> |  |
